attributes.message: Behind the Scenes: Brandenburg at the Bell
attributes.location: Bell Museum, 2088 Larpenteur Avenue W, St Paul, 55113
attributes.description:
With the return of Secrets from a Forest, Bell Members and supporters are invited to join us for a special presentation of the award-winning film and a chance to reflect on the incredible impact of photographer and filmmaker Jim Brandenburg. Brandenburg, who passed away in April 2025, was an important partner for the Bell Museum for decades. Come to learn about his wide-ranging collaborations with the museum, presented by the people who experienced his brilliance up close and personal. Museum leadership will share about his contributions in the exhibits spaces from 4:30-5:30 pm, and Executive Director Holly Menninger and Planetarium Manager Sally Brummel will offer a Q&A session following the presentation of Secrets from a Forest at 5:30 pm. Bell Members and supporters are invited to join us at this exclusive opportunity to share appreciation for such an influential figure in our community! 
Reserve your spot
